text: But Zerubbabel, and Jeshua, and the rest of the heads of fathersÂ’ <FI>houses<Fi> of Israel, said unto them, Ye have nothing to do with us in building a house unto our God; but we ourselves together will build unto Jehovah, the God of Israel, as king Cyrus the king of Persia hath commanded us.
name: Ezra 4:3
